alert.note: Alert for Northern Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 18 at 5:38AM MDT until October 18 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...The Northern Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
